description: Turnout gear reflector is the reflective trim on firefighter gear.
short desc: Turnout gear reflector is the reflective trim on firefighter gear.
source: Sampled from a structural firefighter turnout gear.

measured property.test description: Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.
